article_text: Eight South Florida hospitals are feeling the financial pinch after being penalized by the federal government when their patients suffered from medical conditions acquired at the very places they went to for care.

article_metadata.news-keywords: patient safety, hospitals, Florida, Medicare, penalties, hospital acquired conditions, infections
article_metadata.title: Eight South Florida hospitals face Medicare fines for patient safety | Miami Herald
